name: Meadowland Cooking Cream
description: Meadowland single cream comes in 1l (litre) and is ideal to include as cooking cream on finishing sauces, pasta sauces and for creamy soups. Meadowland delivers the rich, creamy taste of dairy, with a good yield. It achieves sauce consistency quickly, won’t split with acid or alcohol, Bain Marie stable and won’t split when heated or boiled. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
